Product compatibility Devices Galaxy S7, S7 Edge, Note5, S6 edge+, S6, and S6 edge Devices Galaxy S7, S7 Edge, Note5, S6 edge+, S6, and S6 edge
Product features Gear VR Put on the Gear VR, and you're there in the
moment. Experience true 360° virtual reality
with a Super AMOLED display, wide field of view,
precise head-tracking and low latency. All you
need to do is slip in your compatible Samsung
Galaxy smartphone and you're free to take on
the world and beyond. Adventures Anything is possible when you're inside Gear VR.
Whether it's battling the undead or riding a flying
carpet, you won't run out of adventures with an
ever-expanding vault of games and content. Gear 360 The front and rear lenses each capture 180 degrees
horizontally and vertically, creating a seamless and
complete 360-degree field of view. Pair up your
compatible Galaxy smartphone via Bluetooth, then
use Wi-Fi Direct to transform its large screen into a
very handy remote viewfinder and transfer
files in one simple move.
Product specs To learn more about the full range
of Samsung TV products, visit
www.samsung.com/us.
Product compatibility See the full listing of Samsung TVs
that are compatible with your
Samsung Galaxy smartphone at
www.samsung.com/us.
Product features Sharing made seamless With Smart View, you can share screens between
 select Samsung devices and your Smart TV in just
one step. And Quick Connect lets you easily send
content to your TV from your mobile device. 4K SUHD Introducing a new category of TVs. With 4K SUHD TVs,
now you can experience stunning colors, deep contrast,
incredible brightness, and 4K resolution that redefines
your TV viewing experience. More entertainment Watch what you want, when you want, Even enjoy
some of your favorites in stunning 4K UHD
resolution. Simply launch streaming apps like
Netflix, Amazon Instant Video or M-GO for an
enhanced viewing experience. You can also play
some of your favorite games and access apps like
news, weather, sports, music, and more,
right on your Smart TV. For more information, visit
www.samsung.com/us.
For more information, visit
www.samsung.com/pay Product specs Acceptance Samsung Pay is accepted virtually anywhere
you can swipe or tap your card. Security Samsung Pay uses several layers of security. Capacity Payment Cards - 10
Gift Cards - Unlimited
Product compatibility Currently, you must have each of the following
to enjoy Samsung Pay. Devices Galaxy S7 edge, S7, S6 edge+, S6 edge,
S6 active, S6, Note5 Carriers AT&T, T-Mobile, Sprint, US Cellular, Verizon,
Cricket, Metro PCS Payment cards The credit of debit card must be a qualifying Visa,
MasterCard or Anerican Express issued by
one of these banks:

American Express, Bank of America, Chase, CitiBank,
PNC, Synchrony, US Bank, Wells Fargo Smartwatch Payments with Samsung Pay on the Gear S2 are only
compatible with NFC-enabled payment terminals Over-the-air software update is required to download Samsung Pay.
Availability may vary by service provider. Learn how to update your device -
visit the Samsung Pay Support Page. *Only compatible with select Visa, MasterCard and American Express cards
from participating banks. Check with your bank/issue to ensure that your card
is compatible; and check the Samsung Pay Support page for additional
compatibility information regarding devices, carriers and cards.
Product features 3 Simple steps to pay Swipe up Swipe up from the home button, Or, select the
Samsung Pay app icon from your
home screen or app tray. Secure Authorize payments by simply scanning your
fingerprint or entering your pin. Hover & pay Hover your phone over the in-store card reader.
Congratulations! Designed with our best
available security Your purchases remain yours alone. Samsung Pay
uses several layers of security. It keeps your
payment information separate and doesn't store or
share it, so you can pay without worry. Samsung Pay is now available on Google Play
as a free download for compatible devices.
For more information, visit

available Ethernet port
Product compatibility SmartThings works with products from Samsung, Bose,
Schlage, Yale, Cree, Osram Lightify, Honeywell, First
Alert and other brands.

For a full list of compatible products, visit
www.smartthings.com/compatible-products. SmartThings app OS
iOS (8.1 or later),
Android (4.0 or later)
Windows Phone (8.1 or later)
Product Features How It Works App Download the free app to run your home
from your Samsung Galaxy smartphone. Hub Connect the SmartThings Hub to
your Internet router. Things Add as many smart devices as you'd like to
personalize your smart home. Plays Well with Others Add as many or as few smart devices as you want,
choreograph them to work together in one free
app, and create a smarter home that automatically
reacts as life happens. Run Your Home from
Your Phone With the free SmartThings app, you can receive
important notifications about what's happening at
home, control your smart devices with a simple
tap, and automate your home to react to
your unique preferences.
For more information, visit

Product compatibility See which features are compatible with your Android™
phone running Android Version 4.4 and above,
with at least 1.5GB RAM. S Health Phone compatibility Samsung smartphones starting from Galaxy S III
onwards. Non-Samsung Android smartphones are
compatible. Tablets and some mobile devices
may not be supported. OS Requires Android 4.4 and up Samsung Pay Currently, you must have each of the following
to enjoy Samsung Pay: Devices: //Needs update Galaxy S7 edge, S7, S6 edge+, S6 edge,
S6 active, S6, Note5 Over-the-air software update is required to download Samsung Pay.
Availability may vary by server provider. Learn how to update your device -
visit the Samsung Pay Support Page. //Needs update Carriers: AT&T, T-Mobile, Sprint, US Cellular,
Verizon, Cricket, Metro PCS Payment cards: The credit or debit card must be qualifying Visa,
MasterCard or American Express issued by one of these
banks*: American Express, Bank of America, Chase,
CitiBank, PNC, Synchrony, US Bank, Wells Fargo *Only compatible with selected Visa, MasterCard and American Express cards
from participating banks. Check with your bank/issuer to ensure that your card
is compatible; and check the Samsung Pay Support page for additional
compatibility information regarding devices, carriers and cards. Smartwatch Payments with Samsung Pay on the Gear S2 are only
compatible with NFC payment terminals Disclaimers: PHONES TESTED: HTC One(M8), HTc One(M9), LG G–FLEX, Motorola Nexus 6,
LG OPTIMUS G2, LG OPTIMUS G3, LG OPTIMUS G4, Kyocera E6560, LG G Vista,
Motorola Droid Turbo To find out more call 1–800–SAMSUNG. 1. Compatible with select devices using Android 4.4 and later with at least
1.5GB RAM. Supported devices may vary by carrier and device. Some features
may not be available. For best results, connect with compatible Samsung
Galaxy devices.

2. Call experience may vary depending on manufacturer.

3. Some Android phones limited on text reply, call back from text, and read
notification check from phone.

4. No email sync capability for non-Samsung phones.

5. Wi-Fi profile sharing from your phone automatically to your watch may not
be possible with your Android Phone.
Product Features Connectivity Easy to set up with an even-wider range of
Android devices, your Gear S2 will give the
power of a phone on your wrist. S Health Taking charge of your health is easy with S Health
on your Gear S2 and Galaxy smartphone.
S Health helps you stay fit by acting as a personal coach.
The various training programs help in improving
your overall fitness, health and lifestyle. Samsung Pay Pay for your coffee or grab a quick bite with a wave
of your arm. Hold your wrist near the NFC enabled
payment terminal and you're done.
